layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutSVGRoot {svg} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutSVGContainer {g} at (0,-0.30) size 6.03x0.36 [transform={m=((1.00,0.00)(0.00,1.00)) t=(2.25,2.75)}]
      LayoutSVGText {text} at (0,-0.30) size 6.03x0.36 contains 1 chunk(s)
        LayoutSVGInlineText {#text} at (0,-0.30) size 6.03x0.36
          chunk 1 text run 1 at (0.00,0.00) startOffset 0 endOffset 45 width 6.04: "Passes if text is visible and not extra huge."
